name: transcendence-frontend
description: Frontend for the Transcendence web application.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist dist/templates && cp src/index.html dist && cp src/templates/*.html dist/templates && tsc && tailwindcss -i ./src/css/input.css -o ./dist/css/output.css
scripts.predev: mkdir -p dist dist/templates && cp src/index.html dist && cp src/templates/*.html dist/templates
